entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:16 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:16 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:16 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
